sentences.english: Perhaps they spent time in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 也許他們在院子裏打發時光。

sentences.english: He spent his golden years traveling to many parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他通過周遊世界度過了晚年的幸福時光。

sentences.english: He killed off the whole morning by listening to the music.
sentences.chinese: 他通過聽音樂消磨掉了整個上午的時光。

sentences.english: I remember when I went and I had a great time.
sentences.chinese: 我記得我讀大學的時候度過了一段美妙的時光。

sentences.english: Make a commitment to turning off the TV and spending some quality time with your loved ones.
sentences.chinese: 約定好關掉電視機，與家人共渡一段高質量的時光。

sentences.english: Time is running out for my friend.
sentences.chinese: 時光任苒，朋友已經老大不小了。

sentences.english: Thee sandglass remembers the time we lost.
sentences.chinese: 㦱沙漏記得，我們遺忘的時光。

sentences.english: Weep no more , no sigh , nor groan . Sorrow calls no time that's gone .
sentences.chinese: 栵別哭泣，別嘆息，別呻吟，悲傷喚不迴流逝的時光。

sentences.english: Value those times with you kids.
sentences.chinese: 重視這段與孩子在一起的時光。

sentences.english: The natural day is very calm, and will hardly reprove his indolence.
sentences.chinese: 時光的天性就是沉靜，它不會因此而責備自己的懶惰。

sentences.english: By the time afternoon rolls around, you’re in caffeine withdrawal.
sentences.chinese: 下午時光流逝，你沉浸在咖啡因裏面。

sentences.english: When not hacking code he spends time with his family.
sentences.chinese: 當不寫代碼的時候，他喜歡和家人共度時光。

sentences.english: The time we spent together are like fireworks.
Other facilities such as electronic Majong tables and chess board are offered to enrich your leisure time.
sentences.chinese: 公館爲您提供棋牌康樂設施，讓您充分享受休閒時光。

sentences.english: In other words, Mussina wishes the team could have that seventh inning back.
sentences.chinese: 換言之，老穆希望洋基能夠時光倒流到那個第七局。

definition: to pass/to spend (time)/to survive/to get through
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
to cherish the memory of/to think of/reminisce
